Posts.Content: I had the same and they found a vitamin d deficiency so I now take supplements which really help-it may be worth asking for a blood test Bas
Posts.Title: Severe joint pain following chemo. Please help.

Posts.Content: I have had exactly the same as you and had my port fitted last week. I've been told it's very helpful during chemo-my veins are hard to find! I had two plasters, my wounds were slightly uncomfortable but fine now (a week later)- all my nurses and doctors have said it's a good thing!- in some areas of the country it's compulsory.
Posts.Title: FEC with a port
